text: P.T.R College of Engineering and Technology was established in 2001 by Sasikala Memorial Educational Trust. This college is ISO 9001-2015 certified and offers five undergraduate courses. This institute is located 2 km from Madurai city corporation limit and near Kappalur industrial estate.http://www.ptrcet.org/ptrorg.php == Undergraduate courses (4 years) == Bachelor of Engineering degree in http://www.ptrcet.org/ugdepartment.php *Civil Engineering, *Computer Science and Engineering, *Electronics and Communication Engineering, *Electrical and Electronics Engineering, *Mechanical Engineering ==References== == External links == * Category:All India Council for Technical Education Category:Engineering colleges in Tamil Nadu Category:Colleges in Madurai Category:Engineering colleges in Madurai Category:Science and technology in Madurai
title: P.T.R College of Engineering and Technology
